About the Company: Viji Finance LTD. brings deep industry experience, innovative service offerings and next generation global delivery to serve the financial services industry. VIJI Finance Ltd. is in the business of providing financial services to its customers engaged in Infrastructural Development and construction, with a focus on Infrastructure, Housing, and Equity, Vehicle Finance sectors in India. Viji Finance Ltd. has played a fundamental role in financing projects, funded through long-term investment instruments. Viji Finance Ltd. also provides customized financial solutions for Major Groups.
